name: Happy Times
description:
-Goal-

Make 7 town people happy!

Avoid letting 7 town people get sad!

-Controls-

Movement: WASD

Give Happiness: G

Take Happiness: T

TIP: Standing in front of the Tavern will restore your happiness

--Special Notes--

This game was developed for PIMA Spring Class GAM102 HealthJam.

--Special Notes--

-Art Credits-

The following assets used from Unity Playgrounds: bush1, flower1, flower2, GrassFloor1, and Wall1.

-other assets are as follows-
